north_star: Ensure comprehensive visibility into system performance, reliability, and health, enabling proactive management and rapid resolution of issues.
mission: To provide robust monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions that ensure system reliability, performance, and security across the SiriusXM ecosystem.
vision: To create an observability platform that delivers actionable insights and supports continuous improvement in system performance and reliability.
values_principals: Visibility: Ensure comprehensive visibility into system performance and health.
Proactivity: Enable proactive issue detection and resolution.
Reliability: Support high availability and reliability of services.
Security: Maintain security and compliance in monitoring and logging.
Collaboration: Work closely with other teams to enhance observability.

team_structure.title: Team Lead
team_structure.responsibilities: Oversee team operations, prioritize tasks, and ensure alignment with broader goals.

team_structure.title: Observability Engineer
team_structure.responsibilities: Develop and maintain monitoring, logging, and alerting solutions.

team_structure.title: Site Reliability Engineer (SRE)
team_structure.responsibilities: Monitor and improve system reliability and performance.

team_structure.title: Security Engineer
team_structure.responsibilities: Ensure observability solutions meet security and compliance standards.

team_structure.title: Data Analyst
team_structure.responsibilities: Analyze observability data and provide actionable insights.

priorities: Develop and maintain comprehensive monitoring and alerting solutions.
Ensure security and compliance in observability practices.
Provide actionable insights from observability data.
Support high availability and reliability of systems.
Collaborate with other teams to enhance observability.

meeting_cadence.purpose: Quick updates on progress, blockers, and plans for the day.
Plan the work for the upcoming sprint.
Reflect on the past sprint and identify areas for improvement.
Team coordination and updates on ongoing projects.

performance_metrics.justification: High uptime ensures reliability and availability of services.
performance_metrics.measurement: Percentage of time the system is available.

performance_metrics.justification: Quick detection of issues minimizes downtime and impact.
performance_metrics.measurement: Average time taken to detect issues.

performance_metrics.justification: Quick resolution of issues minimizes downtime and impact.
performance_metrics.measurement: Average time taken to resolve issues.

performance_metrics.justification: Accurate alerts reduce noise and ensure focus on real issues.
performance_metrics.measurement: Percentage of alerts that are actionable and correct.

service_level_agreements.SLA: 99.9% uptime for monitoring and alerting systems.
Provide initial response within 15 minutes, 90% of issues resolved within 4 hours.
